statements: DELETE FROM A_B_Testing_Analysis WHERE test_name = 'Control Group';
DELETE FROM A_B_Testing_Analysis WHERE metric_1 < 0.5 AND metric_3 >= 0.3;

DELETE FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 100 AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
